Title: Derek
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Cord Jefferson, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Janet creates a big problem for Michael. Meanwhile, Eleanor lets Chidi in on a secret, and Jason puts Tahani in a difficult position.
